params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit

params.fleetCommander: The address of the FleetCommander contract

returns.shares: The number of shares received from the FleetCommander

params.amount: The amount of shares to withdraw (0 for all)
params.fleetCommander: The address of the FleetCommander contract

returns.assets: The amount of assets received from the FleetCommander

params.amount: The amount of tokens to rescue
params.to: The address to send the rescued tokens to
params.token: The address of the ERC20 token to rescue

params.amount: The amount of fromToken to swap
params.minTokensReceived: The minimum amount of toToken to receive after the swap

returns.swappedAmount: The amount of toToken received after the swap

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw (0 for all)

exitFleet(address,uint256).notice: Exits a FleetCommander by withdrawing tokens
